DFW'S GOLD STANDARD IN ROOFING

Where family values and industry expertise converge to protect your home with excellence

10+ Years Experience
5000+ Homes Protected
About Us

EXCELLENCE. INTEGRITY. FAMILY.

Golden Nail Roofing is a family-owned roofing company rooted in the Dallas-Fort Worth (DFW) community. Led by brothers Carlos and Chris Rodriguez, we leverage over a decade of industry expertise combined with genuine family values to deliver outstanding roofing solutions. We believe in treating every home as if it were our own, ensuring transparent communication and exceptional craftsmanship in every project we undertake.

Learn More
10+ Years
Our Services

COMPREHENSIVE ROOFING SOLUTIONS FOR YOUR HOME

Our Mission

To deliver exceptional roofing services that exceed expectations while building lasting relationships with our community. We believe in doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.

Future Forward

  • Sustainable practices
  • Technology integration
  • Community partnership
  • Continuous improvement

Our Vision

To be the most trusted name in DFW roofing by consistently delivering excellence, fostering innovation, and creating opportunities for our team and community to thrive. We aim to set the gold standard in every aspect of our business, from customer service to installation quality.

Premium Shingle Collection

Heritage Series

Classic Protection

Premium architectural shingles with traditional aesthetics and modern protection. Perfect for homes seeking timeless appeal.

Prestige Collection

Luxury Line

Ultra-premium roofing shingles designed for the most discerning homeowners. Exceptional beauty meets superior performance.

Artisan Elite

Designer Series

Handcrafted appearance with innovative color blending. Transform your home with unmatched curb appeal.

Storm Guard Pro

Impact Resistant

Maximum protection against hail and severe weather. Engineered for Texas storms with Class 4 impact resistance.

EcoShield Series

Sustainable Choice

Environmentally conscious shingles with superior energy efficiency. Cool roof technology meets sustainable materials.

Meet Our Team

The dedicated professionals behind DFW's Gold Standard in roofing excellence

Carlos Rodriguez

Co-Founder & CEO

With over 15 years in the roofing industry, Carlos brings unparalleled expertise and a commitment to excellence. His vision for Golden Nail Roofing was born from a desire to elevate industry standards and treat every customer like family.

üìß carlos@goldennailroofing.com
üì± (817) 555-0101
üíº LinkedIn Profile

Chris Rodriguez

Co-Founder & COO

Chris combines his background in construction management with a passion for customer service. He oversees daily operations and ensures every project meets the Gold Standard of quality that defines our company.

üìß chris@goldennailroofing.com
üì± (817) 555-0102
üíº LinkedIn Profile

Our Story

Founded in 2010 by brothers Carlos and Chris Rodriguez, Golden Nail Roofing emerged from a shared vision to transform the roofing industry in Dallas-Fort Worth. Growing up in a family of contractors, we learned early that quality work and honest relationships are the foundation of any successful business. Today, our team of dedicated professionals continues this legacy, treating every home as if it were our own and every customer as family.

Our Project Management Team

Expert professionals dedicated to making your roofing project seamless

# Enable compression
<IfModule mod_deflate.c>
  AddOutputFilterByType DEFLATE text/html text/css text/javascript application/javascript
</IfModule>

# Browser caching
<IfModule mod_expires.c>
  ExpiresActive On
  ExpiresByType image/jpg "access plus 1 year"
  ExpiresByType image/jpeg "access plus 1 year"
  ExpiresByType image/png "access plus 1 year"
  ExpiresByType text/css "access plus 1 month"
  ExpiresByType application/javascript "access plus 1 month"
</IfModule>

# Custom 404 page
ErrorDocument 404 /404.html

# Remove .html extension
RewriteEngine On
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
RewriteRule ^([^\.]+)$ $1.html [NC,L]

# Force HTTPS
RewriteCond %{HTTPS} off
RewriteRule ^(.*)$ https://%{HTTP_HOST}/$1 [R=301,L]

# Prevent directory browsing
Options -Indexes

# Security headers
<IfModule mod_headers.c>
  Header set X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff"
  Header set X-Frame-Options "SAMEORIGIN"
  Header set X-XSS-Protection "1; mode=block"
  Header set Referrer-Policy "no-referrer-when-downgrade"
</IfModule>
